content.question: The agricultural methods implemented in the third case study could be directly applied to reduce the threat from all of the following environmental or economic challenges that arose during the twentieth century EXCEPT

choices.label: species loss and declines in biodiversity
industrial pollution and greenhouse gas emissions

topic.text: 9.3: Technological Advances - Debates about the Environment after 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
